info.title: Transactions API
info.description: Provides create and read operations on the transaction resource.

get.summary: List all transactions for given account id
get.description: Returns a list containing up to 20 transactions. You can paginate through transactions by supplying next_starting_index in your subsequents calls. next_starting_index contains the transaction_id of the last transaction_id of the current page.

400.description: Returned when the request body is malformatted or does not match the expected request.

401.description: Returned when the request does not contains the user's credentials.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to access the resource.

404.description: Returned when the resource is not found.

500.description: Returned when an unexpected error occured on the server side.

parameters.name: accountID
parameters.description: AccountID is the unique identifier of an account.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: FromDate is starting date to get the transactions.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: ToDate is end date to get the transactions.

parameters.name: transaction_type
parameters.description:
TransactionType is a type of transaction, debit or credit.

 - Credit: Type_Credit is the value for a credit transaction.
 - Debit: Type_Debit is the value for a debit transaction.

parameters.name: after_id
parameters.description: AfterID is a cursor for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit is number of search return of transactions.

transactionsStatus.description:
Status defines the status of a transaction.

 - Success: Status_Success is the value for a successful transaction.
 - Pending: Status_Pending is the value for a pending transaction.
 - Rejected: Status_Rejected is the value for a rejected transaction.

transactionsTFAResponse.description: TFAResponse is the response message for a 2FA request.

transactionsTFAType.description:
TFAType is available type of TFA.

 - SMS: TFAType_SMS Message.
 - SAFEKEY: TFAType_SAFEKEY Application.

latitude.description: The latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

longitude.title: The longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0]

typesLocation.description:
Location is An object representing a latitude/longitude pair. This is expressed as a pair
of doubles representing degrees latitude and degrees longitude.
Values must be within normalized ranges.
Refer to https://godoc.org/google.golang.org/genproto/googleapis/type/latlng.

typesMajorType.description:
MajorType describes the type of the account.

 - Checking: MajorType_Checking account.
 - Saving: MajorType_Saving account.
 - TimeDeposit: MajorType_TimeDeposit for a time deposit account.
 - CommercialLoan: MajorType_CommercialLoan for a business loan account.
 - MortgageLoan: MajorType_MortgageLoan for a home loan account.
 - ConsumerLoan: MajorType_ConsumerLoan for a consumer loan account.

middle_name.title: MiddleName or middle names (space separated) of the person

last_name.title: LastName or last names (space separated) of the person

location.description: Location is the physical location of the interaction.
